revised_title: Dichotriacts: A Study of Growth Forms in Tetraxonid Sponge Spicules
tldr: The author examines the growth forms of Tetraxonid sponge spicules, specifically focusing on the dichotriacts, which are derived from the triact and have a spiral axis. The study provides insight into the evolution and development of these spicules, contributing to our understanding of sponge biology.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Sponge Biology
